member.name: IPipeByte.Pull
member.summary: Retrieves data of the byte type from the pipe source.
member.param: A pointer to the memory buffer that receives the data. The buffer must be able to hold at least the number of bytes specified in cRequest.
The actual number of bytes returned.
member.returns: This method returns S_OK to indicate that the data was retrieved successfully.

member.name: IPipeByte.Push
member.summary: Sends data of the byte type to the pipe source.
member.param: A pointer to the memory buffer that holds the data to be sent.
The number of bytes in the buffer.
member.returns: This method returns S_OK to indicate that the data was sent successfully.

member.name: IPipeByte
member.summary: Transfers data of the byte type (which is 8 bits wide).
